eval_prompts.prompt: Design a parking lot management system for a multi-story garage with 5000 spots, real-time availability tracking, reservation system, and license plate recognition.
Design a coupon/promo code system for an e-commerce platform. Must handle code generation, validation, usage limits, and prevent abuse. 50M orders/month.
Design a news aggregator that crawls 10K news sources, deduplicates articles, categorizes them, and serves personalized feeds to 5M users.
Design a calendar system like Google Calendar with event creation, recurring events, shared calendars, and meeting room booking with conflict detection.
Design a photo backup service like Google Photos with unlimited storage, automatic organization by date/location/faces, and search by natural language queries.
Design an auction system like eBay with timed auctions, real-time bid updates, anti-sniping protection, and bid history. Handle 100K concurrent auctions.
Design a weather data platform that ingests data from 50K weather stations worldwide, runs forecast models, and serves location-based forecasts to 20M app users.
Design a real-time multiplayer word game (like Words with Friends) with matchmaking, turn-based gameplay, scoring, and a friends list. 2M DAU.
Design a digital wallet system that stores prepaid balances, supports top-up via bank transfer or card, peer-to-peer transfers, and merchant payments.
Design a music streaming service like Spotify. Must handle 50M songs, personalized playlists, collaborative playlists, offline downloads, and royalty tracking.
Design a survey/form builder platform like Typeform. Users create custom forms, collect responses, and view analytics. Must handle 10K concurrent form submissions.
Design a social network's friend suggestion system. Must analyze the social graph, compute friend-of-friend suggestions, factor in shared interests, and update in near-real-time.

Design a package tracking system for a logistics company handling 5M packages/day. Must track package location through scanning events, provide real-time tracking to customers, and predict delivery times.
Design a document signing service like DocuSign. Must handle PDF upload, signature placement, multi-party signing workflows, audit trails, and legal compliance.
Design an inventory management system for a warehouse with 1M SKUs. Must track stock levels, handle receiving and shipping, support barcode scanning, and trigger reorder alerts.
Design a code review platform like GitHub Pull Requests. Must support diff viewing, inline comments, review approvals, CI integration, and merge conflict detection.
Design a ride pooling system (like UberPool) that matches multiple riders heading in similar directions into shared rides, optimizing for cost and detour time.

Design an ad serving platform that serves targeted display ads across 10K publisher websites. Must handle 1M ad requests/second with <50ms response time, support real-time bidding, and track impressions/clicks.
Design a healthcare appointment scheduling system for a hospital network with 500 doctors across 20 locations. Must handle scheduling, cancellation, waitlists, insurance verification, and reminders.
Design a crowdfunding platform like Kickstarter. Must handle project creation, pledge processing, stretch goals, refunds if funding goal not met, and project updates.
Design a real-time translation system that translates voice conversations between two people speaking different languages with <2 second latency.
Design a distributed configuration management system (like Consul or etcd) that provides key-value storage with strong consistency, change notifications, and service discovery.
Design a social fitness app where users track workouts, compete in challenges, share achievements, and see a feed of friends' activities. 3M DAU.
Design an API gateway that sits in front of 50 microservices. Must handle authentication, rate limiting, request routing, load balancing, circuit breaking, and request/response transformation.
Design a podcast hosting and distribution platform. Creators upload episodes, the platform distributes via RSS, tracks downloads/listens, and provides analytics. 100K podcasts, 50M listeners.
Design a fraud detection system for a bank that analyzes transactions in real-time and flags suspicious activity. Must handle 50K transactions/second with <100ms decision time.
Design a job/task queue system like Celery or Sidekiq. Must support priority queues, scheduled tasks, retry with backoff, task chaining, and monitoring. Handle 100K tasks/minute.
Design a geo-fencing system that triggers notifications when users enter or leave defined geographic areas. Must handle 1M active geo-fences and 5M user location updates/minute.
Design a feature flag management system that allows teams to toggle features for specific user segments, run percentage rollouts, and kill-switch features instantly across all services.
Design a customer support ticket system like Zendesk. Must handle ticket creation from email/chat/web, agent assignment, SLA tracking, knowledge base search, and reporting.
